meanings.definition: The outline of a person's hair against the scalp.
meanings.sent1: Her hairline framed her face beautifully.
meanings.sent2: He had a receding hairline as he grew older.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous child drew a funny face on his hairline with a marker.
meanings.sent4: The hairline of the mountain against the sky was a breathtaking sight.
meanings.sent5: The barber carefully trimmed the hairline to perfection.

meanings.definition: A very thin line or crack.
meanings.sent1: A hairline crack appeared on the old vase.
meanings.sent2: The hairline in the wall was barely visible.
meanings.sent3: The hairline in the sidewalk seemed to have a life of its own.
meanings.sent4: The hairline of dawn slowly spread across the horizon.
meanings.sent5: The hairline in the glass was so fine, it was almost invisible.
